metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7336 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The qemuMigrationWaitForSpice function in qemu/qemu_migration.c in libvirtbefore 1.1.3 does not properly enter a monitor when performing seamlessSPICE migration, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and libvirtd crash) by causing domblkstat to becalled at the same time as the qemuMonitorGetSpiceMigrationStatus function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7336` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu4
libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvirt package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-0ubuntu4').
